item.title: Storage archetypes to simplify the battery size debate
item.description: Electricity storage will span many scales as we electrify end-use and decarbonize supply. Batteries might be on garage walls (PowerWalls and similar), on wheels (EVs), on poles (next to transformers), on pads (by the local school or small business), in parking lots (to plug into the solar panels on your big box store’s roof), in substations, or upstream of it all, in a field somewhere near wind or solar farms.
